scripts.server-setup: npm i && cd client && npm i && npm run build
scripts.deploy: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && git add . && git commit -m 'deploying-server-and-client' && git push
scripts.server-deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'deploying-server' && git push
scripts.client-deploy: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && git add . && git commit -m 'deploying-server-and-client' && git push
